Sentence: In some cases , we are not able to control the amount or type of  information that other parties like social networks , make available to  us .
When you choose to use a social feature of our games and applications ,  you allow Epic to receive information about you from social networks .
We may provide you marketing for our Services and those of the Facebook Companies .
If your Country of Residence is the United States , the Data Controller is Airbnb , Inc .
